source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
        [pl_log_id]
      , [pl_category]
      , [pl_status]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] as [last_timestamp]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] + 1     as [nextStart_timestamp]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] + 86400 as [tomorrow_timestamp]
      , convert(varchar(10),  [pl_create_date], 112) as lastdate_short
      , convert(varchar(10),  [pl_create_date], 23) as lastdate
      , convert(varchar(10), dateadd(day, 1, [pl_create_date]), 23) as nextdate
  FROM [land].[pipeline_activity_log]
  where [pl_category] = 'survey' and [pl_status]  = 1 and pl_load_type = 'delta'
  order by [pl_log_id] desc

SELECT 
        [pl_log_id]
      , [pl_category]
      , [pl_status]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] as [last_timestamp]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] + 1     as [nextStart_timestamp]
      , [pl_Createdtimestamp] + 86400 as [tomorrow_timestamp]
      , convert(varchar(10),  [pl_create_date], 112) as lastdate_short
      , convert(varchar(10),  [pl_create_date], 23) as lastdate
      , convert(varchar(10), dateadd(day, 1, [pl_create_date]), 23) as nextdate
  FROM [land].[pipeline_activity_log]
  where 1=2
  order by [pl_log_id] desc
